document.full_text: milwaukee brewers outfielder ryan braun has agreed to a five-year contract extension that will keep the three-time all-star with the team through the 2020 season, the club said on thursday.
document.title: brewers' braun signs extension through 2020 season
lines_and_colors: milwaukee brewers outfielder ryan braun has agreed to a five-year contract extension that will keep the three-time all-star with the team through the 2020 season, the club said on thursday.
